title: PSA to Host Career Fair for Maintenance Positions in CVGTravelandtourworld.com
text:
PSA to Host Career Fair for Maintenance Positions in CVG
PSA Airlines, wholly owned subsidiary of American Airlines, is further preparing for the opening of their newest, full-service maintenance base at CVG by hosting their second open house career fair in the Cincinnati area- this time at CVG.
PSA Airlines Maintenance Career Fair
September 26, 2015 11 a.m. – 3 p.m.
Hilton Cincinnati Airport (7373 Turfway Rd. Florence, KY 41042)
PSA is hoping to attract the area’s large population of aviation professionals. Each candidate will have the opportunity to speak directly with PSA hiring managers, receive valuable insight into the positions they wish to apply for and meet the maintenance recruiters that they will work with throughout the hiring process.
PSA is looking to fill maintenance positions including:
A&P Maintenance Technicians
Stores Clerks
Managerial Positions
Supervisor Positions
This is the second new full-service maintenance facility PSA has added in the last year. This growth is expected to continue as PSA increases its footprint to service its growing fleet. Maintenance personnel at PSA enjoy paid training with advancement opportunities as skills and experience grow, worldwide travel benefits on American Airlines and hourly premiums based on licenses held and shift differentials.
Source:- PSA Airlines
